page.title: 08Donna's Year in Glenrothes
page.content: My name is Donna Torley. I go to Pitteuchar West Primary school. I am going to write about P7.When I first came to the P7 area it was new and exciting. The first few months flew by and it was soon Christmas. We started the Chistmas pantomine. It was chaos but fun. Dressing up and learning scripts. On the day of the pantomine excitment was in the air,it was a great success. We also had a scots night which was similar,but less exciting. We have colours in the school that means everybody in the school from P4 upwards gets put into a colour. There are captains in P7. Everybody does tests and sports and you get points for your colour. The colour with the most points wins. Now I am leaving to go to High school it is a big step and I wish I was not taking it.
